QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.PROCEDURE_OCCURRENCE_ID ,t.PERSON_ID ,t.PROCEDURE_CONCEPT_ID as CONCEPT_ID ,t.PROCEDURE_DATE as START_DATE ,t.PROCEDURE_END_DATE as END_DATE ,t.PROCEDURE_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID as TYPE_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.PROCEDURE_OCCURRENCE as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by t.PERSON_ID, t.PROCEDURE_OCCURRENCE_ID
